column4: Hello everyone, i am using ubuntu 11.04, i want to install gnome-shell , i have added the proper ppa, but when i try to install it gives some dependency error :- eg gnome-shell : Depends: gir1.2-json-1.0 but it is not going to be installed
Depends: gir1.2-mutter-3.0 but it is not going to be installed
